Text: FaxEmail Temporary Service InterruptionNovember Dear Enron Users Due to a severe storm which hit central Texas last evening CYNET is experiencing a temporary service interruption of the assigned telephone numbers of its Inbound FaxEmail Service Our local loop carrier has advised us they are aware of the situation and they are working to restore this connectivity While CYNET maintains backup facilities for its FaxEmail services the problem we are faced with is that we can not place the same user telephone number within two different facilities at the same time Our technical team is working on future recommendations in the form of having individual backup numbers in the event of this type of outage We sincerely do apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you and your users and expect to have this service restored as soon as possible Sincerely Robert P Demyanovich President COO CYNET Inc Jones Road Suite Houston Texas Phone FAX email mailto web site The information transmitted is intended only for the person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential andor privileged material Any review retransmission dissemination or other use of or taking of any action in reliance upon this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is prohibited If you received this in error please contact the sender and delete the material from any computer Remove yourself from this list by either Entering your email address below and click REMOVE OR Reply to this message with the word remove in the subject line This email is powered by GMS Global Messaging Software Engine For more information please email us at mailto
